page.topic: Determining if a Record Has Been Changed
page.description: The following technique will determine if a record has changed before it has been saved.

section.title: Examples
section.example: dim t1 as P dim t2 as P dim rec as N dim curr_rec as C dim init_rec as C dim flag_dirty as L t1 = table.open("customer") t2 = table.open("customer") ' fetch record from t1 t1.change_begin() t1.lastname = "simpson" rec = t1.recno() ' determine if a change has been made to any field curr_rec = property_to_string(t1) t2.fetch_goto(rec) init_rec = property_to_string(t2) if (init_rec <> curr_rec) then flag_dirty = .T. else flag_dirty = .F. end if

see.ref: Rolling Back Enter and Change Operations
